recipesJson.name: French Dude Remix #REMIXMONTH
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
Remix of French Dude
Made on Live Mixing: HACKERS ARE HACKING YOUR VAPES

reviews.text: This is very sweet and is a coil killer. This recipe, just as it is written, is a special treat for me and my beloved dripper. Top notch!

Not so good on reviews but mixed this up and love it straight after a s&v but does get better after a few days. Bakery flavour is very moreish with the blueberry sitting on your tongue at the end. Delicious
